item.title: Hood
item.description: We have an excellent stock of eggs, fruit & veg, flour, other store cupboard basics, wine, beer, soft drinks and of course Mikeâ€™s marvellous meals! They are all frozen to be enjoyed at home. How to order: Open for collection, phone 02036013320 for delivery within 5 miles. Open Tuesday-Saturday 9.30am- 2.30pm. 10 delivery slots a day. Website: https://www.hoodrestaurants.com/popup-menu/ and check @hoodstreatham on instagram for daily updates Address: 67 Streatham Hill, SW2 4TX
